name: 异种战争少女
description:
Do you like a story of hot girls wearing tights fighting exotic? Do you like Japanese RPG games?
If you do, that game is too suitable for you.

Game features：

Beautiful painting of heroine

Dressing system

Unique role

Fascinating story

It is a pixel style Japanese RPG game with unexpected novelty story,The player plays a special girl,take risks in a wasteland world full of sin and despair.
And, the player can also dress up for the heroine.
The game is named "Valkyrie", and it tells a story of the heroine's struggle against alien invasion of Earth. Our beautiful heroine will fight against oppression to win her freedom and take revenge on her father.
Players will experience the intense conflict, intrigues, and betrayal in the wasteland world along with our heroine Vanessa Portman's footsteps. Meanwhile, enjoy the game's rich scenarios and various events.
To revenge on her father, to save her lover who is kidnapped by the aliens, how will our heroine make her choices and sacrifices?

Character introduction：
Vanessa Portman :
As the protagonist of the game, Vanessa Portman is an Valkyrie pilot of Crimson alliance squad. She’s the 18 years old daughter of the Empire Chancellor, who plotted the death of Vanessa’s mother and countless civilians. Thereafter, she chose to rebel against the Empire.

Natali:
Natali was once captured and humiliated by an alien species called E.B. She was rescued in from an operation of Empire fleet, and joined Empire’s Special Forces.

Victor:
Victor is a reliable pilot and used to serve in the Empire fleet, and decided to overthrow the Empire’s reign.

Lil’Tong
Always passionate and eager for actions, the newly joined rebel Lil’Tong fights to prove himself, but he will be woke up by the brutal reality one day.

E.B.:
Alien creature with abominable appearance. Their purpose of invading Earth is yet unrevealed.
